title: HOUR 1 - Pro Bowl?
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Pro Bowl?
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--ponders whether anyone actually cares about the Pro Bowl and why Pro Bowl voting wraps up with several weeks left in the regular season. Speaking of the Pro Bowl, Baltimore Raven quarterback Lamar Jackson is definitely a Pro Bowl-caliber quarterback in Doug's eyes--but there are more deserving quarterbacks in the AFC this year. Also, Arizona Cardinal quarterback Kyler Murray must address the failures in his career so he can better respond to them in the future. Finally, do the Los Angeles Lakers have an identity crisis?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
